Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
AI gives me timely feedback before the due date, improving my work
I have not reached out to a teacher for feedback on my work before it was due as I doubt they would help much anyway - they cant really give us the answers

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI made me feel confident i was on the right track. Cant really comment about teachers

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI sometimes can be a bit vague. At least when you get your assignment back a teacher can provide accurate, specific feedback that I actually trust
